|brand = FriendlyARM |model = NanoPi K |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = 1 Plus |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 2 March 2020 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/NanoPi_K1_Plus |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Allwinner;H5; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARMv8-A |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.3 GHz<!-- 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 0 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B4G16460-BCK0; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211E; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2017.11;; |stockos = Linux;4.14.111;FriendlyCore (UbuntuCore 16.04);
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, eMMC module socket, |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = USB 2.0 Female Micro-B
|serial = yes, 4-pin header, 3.3V TTL, (115200 8N1),, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDMI 1.4, Micro SD Card slot, DVP Camera Interface, CVBS header, Microphone, IR receiver, I2S, I2C, GPIO, |addchip = 3-pin Microprocessor Reset Circuit;ON Semi;NCP803;;1;,,, 1A, 1.5MHz PWM Step-Down DC/DC Converter;Richtek;RT8059;;2;,,, 2.5A, 1MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator; Silergy Corp;SY8032;;1;,,, 6A, 18V I2C Programmable Voltage Regulator;Silergy;SY8106A;;1;,,, 5.5V, 2A Low Loss Power Distribution Switch;Silergy;SY6280;;1;,,, 300mA CMOS LDO Regulator;Richtek;RT9193;;1; |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = fa |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Android 7, FriendlyWrt, Armbian, DietPi,
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 04/2018 |estprice = 35 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = <!-- Radio module name, optional link, Leave blank for none --> |rad1modif = SDIO 3.0 |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8189ETV; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = integrated |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{see also|NanoPi series|List of Single-board computers}}
===Specifications=== *CPU: ''[[Allwinner]]'' H5 @1.3GHz (Quad-core Cortex-A53) *GPU: ''Mali-450MP4'' @600MHz (H.265/HEVC 4K) *Memory: 2GB (DDR3) SDRAM (Samsung K4B4G16460-BCK0 Ã—4) *Onboard Storage: TF card (max. 128GB)/MMC card slot, eMMC module socket *Ports: 1x GbE LAN, 3x USB 2.0 ports
==Links of Interest== *[http://wiki.friendlyarm.com/wiki/index.php/NanoPi_K1_Plus ''NanoPi K1 Plus'' on '''FriendlyARM''' Wiki] *[http://linux-sunxi.org/FriendlyARM_NanoPi_K1_Plus ''FriendlyARM NanoPi K1 Plus'' on '''Linux-Sunxi''' Wiki] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2018/04/24/nanopi-k1-plus-is-a-35-allwinner-h5-development-board-using-raspberry-pi-form-factor/ ''NanoPi K1 Plus is a $35 Allwinner H5 Development Board'' on '''CNX|Software''' ] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/open-spec-sbc-is-a-clone-of-a-clone-of-a-clone-of-a-raspberry-pi-3/ ''Open-spec SBC is a clone of a clone of a clone of a Raspberry Pi 3'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
[[Category:English Documentation]]
